name: Killer Cows
description:
The basis of the game is to delay an inevitable death for as long as possible. As you enter the game, the environment, a farm, begins to flood with wheeled cows. Cows come in three varieties: the normal cow, slightly faster than the character, is the most common; the baby cow, the fastest cow, is rare and highly deadly; the god cow, a rapidly accelerating giant cow, this cow is a one of a kind cow that focuses on breaking map exploits where the player can remain still for long periods.

    An important part of the game is the concept of a high score. Scores are achieved by surviving as long as you can. The highest score - most likely in one session as a permanently-saved high score seems too difficult - is saved and serves as a goalpost for the player.
